TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SqlServerValueGenerationConvention extends Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Metadata.Conventions.RelationalValueGenerationConvention

Docs.summary: A convention that configures store value generation as on properties that are part of the primary key and not part of any foreign keys, were configured to have a database default value or were configured to use a . It also configures properties as if they were configured as computed columns.
Docs.remarks: See Model building conventions, and Accessing SQL Server and Azure SQL databases with EF Core for more information and examples.
